column1: [[File:Ted Nasmith - At the Court of the Fountain.jpg|thumb|[[Ted Nasmith]] - ''At the Court of the Fountain'']]'''Citadel of Gondor''' was a term sometimes used loosely of [[Minas Tirith]] in [[Gondor]]
column2: but in fact strictly referring to the fortified seventh and highest circle of that city.<ref>{{RK|V1}}</ref>

column1: It was the city's strongest point
column2: surrounded by high walls and battlements on the 'keel'. One reached the Citadel through the Seventh Gate
column3: manned by the [[Guards of the Citadel]].

column1: The Citadel housed the [[Court of the Fountain (Minas Tirith)|Court of the Fountain]]
column2: the [[Tower of Ecthelion]] and its court with the [[White Tree of Gondor|White Tree]].  There were also the [[King's House]]
column6: and other buildings for guests and other workers.
